Package it.polimi.LM39.model.instanteffect

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CoinForCard
    Used by Buildings instant effect, when activated it gives *coinqty* coins based on cards of type *cardType*
    DoublePointsTransformation
    Used by Buildings instant effect, when activated gives to the player points in return for resources asks the player to choose the effect to activate
    DoubleResourcesTransformation
    Used by Buildings instant effect, when activated gives to the player resources in return for resources asks the player to choose the effect to activate
    GetCard
    Used by characters,ventures instant effect, when activated it allow the player to do a free action (value: *cardValue*) to take a card of *cardtype*
    GetCardAndPoints
    Used by characters instant effect, when activated it allow the player to do a free action (value: *cardValue*) to take a card of *cardtype* it also gives points to the player
    GetCardAndResources
    Used by characters instant effect, when activated it allow the player to do a free action (value: *cardValue*) to take a card of *cardtype* it also gives resources to the player
    GetDiscountedCard
    Used by character (Dame) instant effect, when activated it allow the player to do a free action (value: *cardValue*) to take a card of *cardtype* it also apply a discount on the card's cost
    HarvestProductionAction
    Used by characters,ventures,leaders instant effect, when activated it allow the player to do a free harvest or production action of value *actionValue*
    HarvestProductionAndPoints
    Used by characters,ventures,leaders instant effect, when activated it allow the player to do a free harvest or production action of value *actionValue* it also gives the player points
    InstantEffect
    class (can't be abstract because RuntimeAdapterFactory needs a concrete class) that will be extended by all instant effects
    NoInstantEffect
    class which indicates the absence of a Instant effect in the card
    Points
    instant effect, when activated it gives to the player *points* points
    PointsTransformation
    Used by Buildings instant effect, when activated gives to the player points in return for resources
    Resources
    instant effect, when activated it gives to the player *resources* resources
    ResourcesAndPoints
    instant effect, when activated it gives to the player *resources* resources and *points* points
    ResourcesAndPointsTransformation
    Used by Buildings instant effect, when activated gives to the player resources and points in return for resources
    ResourcesTransformation
    Used by Buildings instant effect, when activated gives to the player resources in return for resources
    SetFamilyMember
    Used by Federico da Montefeltro instant effect, when activated allows the player to change the value of a family member
    VictoryForCard
    Used by Ventures instant effect, when activated it gives *victoryqty* victory points based on cards of type *cardType*
    VictoryForMilitary
    Used by Characters instant effect, when activated it gives *victoryqty* victory points based on player's military points
